text: Replenishment or recruitment only happens at your ports.
Left-click to inspect\\nMust break blockade first
Left-click to select\\nMust break siege first
Left-click to inspect\\nRight-click to move to the closest landing site
Right-click to declare war\\nLeft-click to inspect
Left-click to select\\nMust break blockade first
Left-click to select\\nMust break siege first
Left-click to select\\nRight-click to move to the closest landing site
Left-click to select\\nThe port is already occupied
Right-click to move to the closest landing site
Right-click to attack the port\\nLeft-click to inspect
Right-click to garrison the port\\nLeft-click to select

Right-click to garrison the settlement\\nLeft-click to select\\n\\nGarrisoning a settlement will provide a bonus to [[img:icon_public_order]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}}, though this will lessen based on the number of settlements controlled within the province.
Right-click to exchange units\\nLeft-click to select
Right-click to exchange units\\nLeft-click to select
Agents cannot act against their own settlements.
This settlement is already besieged.\\n[[col:yellow]]Attacking foreign assets is an act of war![[/col]]
This settlement is already blockaded.\\n[[col:yellow]]Attacking foreign assets is an act of war![[/col]]
[[col:red]]Settlements that are under siege cannot be targeted.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This army cannot attack in its current stance.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This army cannot move in its current stance.[[/col]]
[[col:yellow]]Action against foreign assets may have diplomatic repercussions![[/col]]
[[col:yellow]]Attacking foreign assets is an act of war![[/col]]
Left-click to inspect\\nRight-click to disembark and attack
[[col:yellow]]Attacking will exit this army's current stance.[[/col]]
[[col:yellow]]Moving will exit this army's current stance.[[/col]]
